original_text:
Emerald’s Infinity Reels
Il protagonista di Emerald’s Infinity Reels è il Leprechaun, uno gnomo tipico della mitologia irlandese appartenente al mondo delle fate. Caratteristica di questo simpatico folletto è la sua propensione agli scherzi e la capacità di costruire scarpe per sé e per le fate. Il Leprechaun spesso viene rappresentato con una cetra, altro simbolo appartenente al folklore irlandese.
Ogni elemento di Emerald’s Infinity Reels è un omaggio all’Irlanda, a partire dal bosco magico e lussureggiante che si osserva sullo sfondo, con quadrifogli e pentoloni tipici della cultura celtica. I simboli anziché sui rulli atterrano su una cascata di acqua cristallina, e sulla destra c’è una lavagna di legno con una funzione ben precisa che vedremo nel dettaglio più avanti. Nella console sotto la griglia troviamo il variatore di puntata, la doppia freccia per far correre i rulli a velocità maggiore, il tasto Start e Autoplay, oltre alle informazioni riguardanti vincite e saldo. Qualche simpatica animazione accompagna le fasi principali di gioco, reso ancor più coinvolgente da una musica rilassante e dallo scrosciare dell’acqua della cascata.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha 3 rulli e 4 righe. La puntata minima è di 0,10 €, quella massima di 50 €. Si possono impostare 10 giri automatici , ma anche 50 o 100 o farli andare all’infinito e poi bloccarli in qualsiasi momento cliccando sul tasto di avvio. Altrimenti si possono impostare  limiti di perdita, limiti di vincita totale o di vincita singola, raggiunti i quali l’Autoplay si bloccherà.
La volatilità è alta, quindi è vero che per vincere occorrerà fare qualche spin in più, ma gli importi saranno sempre abbastanza alti. Ottimo l’RTP, pari al 96,3%.
Simboli e funzionalità
È il momento di soffermarci sul punto forte della slot, i rulli infiniti. In pratica, ogni volta che si ha una combinazione vincente, il simbolo sul primo rullo viene trasferito nella tabella di legno sulla sinistra e l’ultimo rullo riparte. Fin quando sul primo rullo apparirà ancora lo stesso simbolo vincente, esso verrà collezionato. Stesso discorso vale per i moltiplicatori x2 che a fine spin saranno applicati alla vincita.
Un altro speciale moltiplicatore X2 invece raddoppierà i simboli vincenti presenti sulla griglia di gioco.
I simboli sono sei, tre pietre preziose (rosso, giallo, verde), una pipa, un boccale, e il nostro Leprechaun. Con la puntata minima di 0,10 €, la pietra verde ripaga con 0,04 €, la gialla 0,05 €, la rossa 0,06 €. La pipa 0,10 €, il boccale 0,15 €, il Leprechaun 0,30 €.
La cetra è il nostro simbolo Bonus. Collezionandone almeno 3 si otterranno 12 Free Spins e per ogni Bonus aggiuntivo si avranno 2 ulteriori giri gratuiti. Tutti i simboli collezionati durante la funzione Bonus verranno tenuti sino alla fine, così da poter ottenere vincite maggiori. Ulteriori 3 Free Spins riattivano la funzione.
Opinioni su Emerald’s Infinity Reels
Esprimere un giudizio su Emerald’s Infinity Reels è abbastanza semplice. L’originalità del gameplay, i pochi simboli presenti, i moltiplicatori, ci hanno convinto appieno sulla bontà del prodotto. Di sicuro a risaltare è il sistema di rulli infiniti, che fa davvero aumentare le chance di portarsi a casa un bel gruzzoletto. La grafica è di ottima fattura, la musica rilassante e il valore RTP è di livello ottimo. Di certo non è una slot adatta a chi cerca giochi complessi multilivello o con gameplay sofisticati, ma è l’ideale per chi ha voglia di passare qualche ora lieta con una slot leggera e semplice.

raw_translation.response:
Emerald's Infinity Reels: A Review for Experienced Gamblers

Are you ready to venture into Emerald's Infinity Reels? This slot game features the mischievous Leprechaun, a symbol of Irish mythology and the fairy world. With his love for pranks and skill in crafting shoes, this endearing sprite often carries a lyre, another symbol of Irish folklore.

Every element of this game pays homage to Ireland, from the lush, magical forest in the background adorned with clovers and Celtic cauldrons to the cascading clear water holding the symbols instead of simple reels. Look to the wooden tablet to the right for more information on scoring.

The game grid features 3 reels and 4 rows. Bet as little as €0.10 or as much as €50.00 to test your luck. Set the automatic spin function at 10, 50, or 100, or play on infinitely until you wish to end the game. With the high volatility and an RTP percentage of 96.3%, the objective is to win big.

Symbols and Special Bonuses
What makes Emerald's Infinity Reels stand out? The infinite reels, which at each successful spin see the first reel transfer its winning symbol to a scoreboard on the upper left, giving the player a second chance to win big as the final reel spins again. This continues until the first reel's symbol is changed, resulting in all of the symbols getting collected. Additionally, a special X2 multiplier doubles the value of any winning symbols.

There are six symbols in total: three precious stones in red, yellow, and green, a pipe, a mug, and of course, the Leprechaun himself. At the minimum bet level, the green stone pays back €0.04, the yellow €0.05, the red €0.06. The pipe is worth €0.10, the mug €0.15, and the Leprechaun €0.30.

To activate the bonus round, collect a minimum of three lyre symbols. During the free spins, any collected symbols remain in play, leading to bigger payouts. An additional gathering of three lyres will reactivate the free spins.

Overall, Emerald's Infinity Reels offers a unique experience to those looking for a simple but engaging game to pass the time without overwhelming complexity. The graphics and music are top-notch, and the infinite reels offer multiple opportunities to win big and enjoy the charming Irish theme.

Emerald's Infinity Reels: A Tribute to the Leprechaun Mythology of Ireland

Emerald's Infinity Reels takes you on a journey to the magical and lush green forests of Ireland, where the Leprechaun, a typical gnome of Irish mythology belonging to the world of fairies, is waiting to surprise you with his mischievous ways. The reels cascade down a crystal-clear waterfalls, and on the right-hand side, you'll find a wooden chalkboard with some intriguing functions.

As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the high volatility of the game, which promises significant winnings, even though you might need to spin the reels a few more times than usual. The minimum bet is €0.10, and the maximum is €50, allowing you to tailor the game to suit your gambling style. You can play ten automatic spins or set it to go on indefinitely until you hit your chosen limit.

The game's RTP is 96.3%, which is excellent news for those looking for a profitable game to play. The symbols pay handsomely, so keep an eye out for the three precious stones, the pipe, and the ale mug, and, most importantly, the Leprechaun, who pays the highest reward.

What sets Emerald's Infinity Reels apart is its infinite reels, which means that every time you land a winning combination, the symbol on the first reel moves to the wooden chalkboard, and the last reel restarts. The same winning symbols that appear on the first reel are collected and paid out with a 2x multiplier to your winnings.

Look out for the bonus symbol, the Irish harp, which activates the 12 free spins round and earns you two additional spins for every extra bonus symbol you land. During the free spins, all winning symbols are collected and paid out with a 2x multiplier, increasing your winnings.

In summary, Emerald's Infinity Reels offers a refreshing and unique gaming experience, with few symbols and an exciting infinite reels feature. It's perfect for those looking for a simple yet rewarding game that will allow you to enjoy a few hours of gambling  with some light-hearted entertainment.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Emerald's Infinity Reels is an Irish-themed slot game featuring a 3-reel, 4-row grid. Bet as little as €0.10 or as much as €50.00 and set the automatic spin function to 10, 50, or 100. With high volatility and an RTP of 96.3%, the objective is to win big.

Infinity Reels Feature

Emerald's Infinity Reels stands out with its unique infinite reels feature. The first reel transfers its winning symbol to a scoreboard on the upper left, giving the player a second chance to win big as the final reel spins again. This continues until the first reel's symbol is changed, resulting in all of the symbols getting collected. Moreover, a special X2 multiplier doubles the value of any winning symbols.

Symbols and Payouts

Emerald's Infinity Reels features six symbols: three precious stones in red, yellow, and green, a pipe, a mug, and the Leprechaun himself. The green stone pays back €0.04, the yellow €0.05, and the red €0.06. The pipe is worth €0.10, the mug €0.15, and the Leprechaun €0.30. Collect a minimum of three lyre symbols to activate the free spins bonus round and enjoy bigger payouts as collected symbols remain in play.

Free Spins Bonus Round

To activate the free spins bonus round in Emerald's Infinity Reels, collect a minimum of three lyre symbols. During the free spins, any collected symbols remain in play, leading to bigger payouts. An additional gathering of three lyres will reactivate the free spins.

Theme and Design

Emerald's Infinity Reels pays homage to Ireland with its lush, magical forest background adorned with clovers and Celtic cauldrons. The cascading clear water holds symbols instead of simple reels, with the right wooden tablet displaying information on scoring. The mischievous Leprechaun, symbolizing Irish mythology and the fairy world, is the main character of the game and has a love for pranks and skill in crafting shoes. The graphics and music are top-notch, adding to the engaging Irish theme.
